name: ETERNALISM
description:
ETERNALISM is a short & humble 3D puzzle game built around the basic manipulation of space-time. 

I made this (my first game ever) for the game jam "a jam about time" hosted by Lone Rabbit from 25th JUNE - 11th JULY 2021.

Thanks everyone for checking out my project!!

Unfortunately I did not have enough time to package the game for Windows as well, but I will try to make this happen for the near future (after the jam's voting period finishes)...
